text: George Henry Ivor Baldock (; 9 March 1993 â€“ 9 October 2024) was an English- born Greek professional footballer who played as a right-back or right wing- back. He played for the Greece national football team from 2022 until 2024. He was born in Buckingham, England. Baldock had drowned and died in the pool of his house in Glyfada, Athens on 9 October 2024, at the age of 31. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1993 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Accidental deaths by drowning Category:English footballers Category:Greek footballers Category:Milton Keynes Dons F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Buckinghamshire Category:Sportspeople from Athens
title: George Baldock
